name: José González
desc: Un emprenedor com Déu mana, que té cura dels treballadors, d'aquests que ja no en queden. Va muntar el seu negoci de rètols a Barcelona i el dia d'avui encara pots veure la seva feina allà on vagis. La seva filla va pel camí del seu pare, diu que vol ser una líder i canviar el món cap a millor.
descENG: A businessman with a generous heart, who cares for his workers—a rare breed these days. He set up his sign-making business in Barcelona, and even today, you can still see his work wherever you go. His daughter follows in her father’s footsteps, saying she wants to be a leader and change the world for the better.
